attributes.additional_details:
AM's criticise the EU referendum result, yet the referendum that established the Senedd was carried on a mere 5000 votes on a far lower %age turnout.

The Assembly has taken upon itself the right to seize the organs of the dead while at the same time failing to get ambulances to the dying

Its policy on disposal of land assets seems incompetent at best and corrupt at worst.

Andrew RT Davies admits they would not win a referendum to establish it today.

It is a costly white elephant and must go
attributes.background: In the light of continued failings in key policy areas, revelations of incompetence or worse in its financial dealings and its latest attempt to overthrow the will of the British people in the EU referendum. I believe the time has come to call for this institution to be wound up

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to return the powers devolved to the Welsh Assembly to the UK Parliament and Government, if that's what you would like to happen.
